attributes.action: President Trump publicly apologise for accusing GCHQ of 'wire tap'
attributes.additional_details: This constitutes uncorroborated slander and we demand that the comment is fully and unconditionally retracted and that the President make an apology to the PM, Queen and the People of the United Kingdom.
attributes.background: In recent Whitehouse press briefing the president has named  GCHQ as having tapped/wiretapped/carried out surveillance of behalf of then president Obama

rejection.details: This petition calls on the President of the USA, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.
